Headline: #34 South Michigan & #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at Michigan/112th
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan & #19 Michigan/119th buses temp. rerouted via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th & Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan and #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th, then resume their normal routes on Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier minor fire at track level. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier minor fire at track level.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle bus service has been requested between O'Hare and Jefferson Park to provide connecting service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
